alert.note: Alert for George; Greene; Perry (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 06 at 6:24PM CST until February 07 at 4:48PM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Mississippi... Leaf Near Mclain affecting Greene, Perry and George Counties. For the Leaf River...including Mclain, New Augusta...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Leaf Near Mclain. * WHEN...Until tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 18 feet, Considerable flooding of agricultural and lowlands near the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:15 PM CST Sunday the stage was 19.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late tomorrow morning and continue falling to 10 feet Friday evening. - Flood stage is 18 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued when updates occur.
